Love the color,material is a bit different but nice, its warm and it fits great. It said, machine washable but I don't think I will. You could buy ànother if it gets dirty it's such a great value.

The peachy color is beautiful, very upbeat! The generous tailoring & cut look great - you can tie the belt or let it remain loosely open (tie the belt behind you instead). I would not wear this in  freezing temperatures, but it’s perfect for very chill and cold days.  It is more a fashion choice to replace a heavy sweater, jacket or trench coat. Looks elegant in camel color.

I originally ordered this coat in a medium, and it was a little small, as far as the wraparound. I ordered it in a large, and I absolutely love it. It’s polyester and cotton, which is quite warm, but very light.
Coat is very nice for the price range. I wish they learned to pack things better. But outside of that the coat is very nice.

This product arrived and I was a little worried because the reviews stated the item was frequently returned. It arrived and the color is so vibrant (purchased the burgundy color). The coat is nicely lined and is much thicker than I expected for the price. Feel like this is a great value for the money.

I adore this coat. It is very good quality. The fit is right. Keeps me nice and warm. The color is off a little. I ordered red and love the color I got. But it almost seems like a heavy pink.

Wonderful quality thickness, size color the quality is outstanding. I’ve washed it gently in cold water. I get so many compliments. My goal is to order every color. I’m so happy.💕❤️

From the product images I thought “brown” would be too dark, so I ordered “light brown” which turned out to be very yellow under-toned and a bit too light/unsaturated appearing for me. Ordered brown and it was exactly what I was hoping for - a medium neutral, camel-leaning brown. Comparison shot shows brown on the left and light brown on the right. I’m 5’4”, 125lbs, and a small fits perfect with room for a light/medium thickness sweater underneath. I’m 34C and can close it all the way, but larger busts might feel a smidge tight. Sleeves are a good length and overall length hits just below knee. The belt is a good thickness to stay tied and lay nicely. Warm enough for winter in the south and love that it’s lined all the way through. This is a win - will be ordering in black and burgundy.
Fits TTS and is great lightweight coat
The coat color is not dark red it's a washed red. Also a little tighter in the shoulder and sleeves.  I ordered a bigger sizes than I normally wear still tight.

I have the camel color. It's very pretty a little over sized but heavy. The quality is poorly made. I have worn it about 5 times in 3 months,it's already showing signs of the stitching coming loose and the lining is extremely off. Price to high for the quality.

评论概述: Love it but not true to size
评论详情: I love the feel, the weight and the softness of this coat, however I feel that the medium is a bit small for a medium coat. The sleeves are a great length, the length of the coat is great and fits fine if I kept my arms down the whole time. It feels snug when I bring my arms in front as if I were driving. It gets tight in the back and the under arm areas are too small. I’m 5’3” and 135 lbs and I feel this needs a bit more room. I am returning this and not ordering a large because it would be too big.
Too small

For the price, this is a very cute and wearable coat. The fabric is good, it hangs nicely, and it is fully lined. My only complaint is how extremely wrinkled it came to me—folded into a tiny plastic bag. I had to spend a half hour with a commercial steamer to get it to look like it should.
Soft, comfortable, and stays tied with a single twist. Love this coat!

I brought this coat to wear over my dress for a gala. My dress was pretty thin … considering it was essentially a one piece bathing suit with a sequin long sleeve and skirt overcoat lol. But I really like it! I’m an athletic built, hour glass but slightly bottom heavy, short woman. 5’2, 155, 34DD, size 6 jeans. It does feel heavy, but it is warm. I like that it has pockets, but they are designed into the coat in a way that they hide and don’t add bulk to the waist area. There’s no closure besides the removable belt which the loops do stick out a little. Overall definitely worth the price. I’m considering buying another one is a differently color

评论概述: Women’s classic coat lapel wrap tie
评论详情: Absolutely recommend this baby. Fabric soft and heavier feel. Love the camel color. My obsessive side wants all the colors! Lining is a beauty. Be prepared to steam it or bring to dry clean for a smoothing. It definitely comes very wrinkled, but don’t be discouraged. Once it’s wrinkled free it’s super impressive looking. Totally worth every penny! So thank you to the one with the brilliant marketing skills. Haven’t worn yet but looks great hanging in my closet being very patient. Don’t hesitate! I did size up and shoulders are perfect and just making a nice fit at my hip area. Sooo size up ladies. The style will look great looser anyway.

Purchased this coat last yr in Green and LOVED it. It was beautiful, looked just like the picture, fast forward bought it in another color (tan) and it’s garbage. I saw it in sale and decided to grab it. Size not the same, thickness not the same..this isn’t the same coat. I’d whether pay full price for a better quality. RETURNING!

On the website, this looked like a classic wool camel coat, winter weight. It's not even pretending to be wool. It looks and feels more like microfiber. It's lightweight, good only for early fall or a Florida winter. It's definitely not a winter coat. Its color is more school bus than camel. I was so excited to find this and so disappointed when it arrived.  Sign me "Bummed."
I loved the color , this coat was beautiful, true to the size worth the money
Didn’t look like much out the bag but paired with the right outfit (red dress) it was a banger. It was worth it. It’s comfortable not scratchy, fit well and looked great.

评论概述: I was unsure, but it is Cute, Comfortable, and Travels Well
评论详情: Have you ever been so unsure about an order when you placed it and it exceeded your expectations? That was this coat for me.  It is thicker than I expected it to be, which makes it the perfect fall coat. It looks good with or without the belt. Although I love having the option to tie it closed if it gets colder when I'm out for the night. It held up to my international trip. I shoved it in a suitcase multiple times, wore it while walking around the city, and carried it a lot when it got too warm to wear it. As long as I hung it up at night it wasn't too wrinkled the next day.  BE WARNED: I am 5'4" and it is a very long coat on me. I like the length, but I know some people like their long coats to be a little shorter than this.  I would buy this coat again.
Honestly I was not expecting the cost to be as good as it is! It kept me warm and is so so cute! Received a bunch of compliments! Ordered an xl and it fit perfectly

I’m 5’31/2- 5’4 in tall. This beauty is even lined. Great quality. I got the camel. Going to give as Christmas presents. Fabulous quality and Easy to iron. Fits like a glove. True to size. I’m size 8-10 or 38 EU. Love it!!😍
Fast delivery, perfect fit, the only thing I have questions about is the creases.

I bought this for one purpose........ I had an holiday event...... First I found a beautiful off-white sweater dress. It was a very simple straight, mock neck, below the knee very classic look. On the hunt for Boots and Gold earrings. It was January, what would I wear to stay warm........ I found the coat of my dreams.. I wasn't looking for a winter coat or a button up. I also never liked a tight fit design. I wanted the perfect finishing touch. I wore it open to see expose my dress and boots. I have complements all night, from people I did not know saying I looked so elegant and classy..  Never had anything like that happen...  wow..  The quantity is amazing, looks and feels is unbelievable. So know I have the red for the season and the beautiful tan.

The coat is beautiful and the cleaner told me what a beautiful coat it was.  Worth ordering but be prepared to have it professionally pressed.

There are not many review for those of us that are a little shorter.  Being short I have long legs for my height, so I thought the length may work.  The length personally made me feel like a little girl trying on my mom’s clothes. The coat was nice and I am disappointed it did not fit right for me.
This coat is perfect for a night out, a day at the office, and anything in between. Very warm. Wrinkles easier than I’d like it to, but it’s not bad. Great quality otherwise

评论概述: Absolute favorite coat I’ve ever owned.
评论详情: I had this in my wishlist for a solid year and waited all summer to get this - I’m SO glad I held onto it!! Winters are rough in the north Midwest so I take my coats seriously. It’s lined inside, but the outer material itself is really thick. When I tie it, I don’t overlap both sides, otherwise it looks like a bathrobe lol. You can also take the belt out and put another belt in if you want a chic New York winter moment. LOVE it. So warm, fits perfect, color is a beautiful camel tone.

These jackets are very thick and weighted . Perfect for cooler weather . I don’t think they would do good in the cold cold . Yes the material is thick, but not thick enough for that . I got the dark brown and light brown and black . The dark brown isn’t nearly as dark as the photo shows . But that’s okay ! I’m 5’6 - 136 lbs I ordered small first and they fit pretty well but the arms were too short . Got the medium size, and the sleeves are a good length and I feel like the waist is the same as the small so it’s a win . It goes down to my knees (it looks nice) . Pockets are a great size not super deep, not shallow either . It does come with a slight smell, but not super potent like other things I’ve ordered . Maybe 1 wash it’ll come out, or even a round of a refreshing laundry spray . ** photo reference is just to show the dark brown isn’t that dark, it’s still pretty light . If you want an in between kinda color of the photo of dark and the light brown . 🙃
Fabric is heavy enough to keep warm Looks stylish, fit well on my 5’8” frame. Can't wait to start wearing it Color is as represented and was very affordable.

I love this coat! I bought this for a trip to Ireland I having coming up this fall and I can't wait to wear it! It feels expensive and the camel color is so pretty. If I lived in a climate where it was actually cool in the fall/winter I would buy it in a brown as well.
